analysis.key_quote: I urge the Office of Personnel Management to rescind this rule in its entirety. If any elements are retained, they must be significantly amended to: • Preserve full due process and appeal rights; • Protect whistleblowers and independent adjudicators; • Reinforce merit-based hiring and promotion; • Prevent political retaliation; • Uphold statutory checks and constitutional balances.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed Schedule Policy/Career rule, citing concerns about the erosion of due process, merit protections, and the potential for politicization of the civil service. It emphasizes the need to uphold constitutional principles and protect the integrity of the federal workforce.
